versions.localizedDescription:
# What's New

## Important
- Complete UI and Controller Handling Rewrite.
--- 

## Updates
- Updated iOS 26 JIT to be faster and map on-launch. 
- Menu Button enabled by default.
- C# Trimming from Partial > Full. (Fixes Super Mario 3D All-Stars and other game launchers for A14 / M1 (Non-TXM) and below on iOS 26 and all devices on iOS 18)
- All settings options now have information.
- DLC and Update Manager can now import more then 1 at a time.
- Waiting for JIT View.
- JIT Indicator turns orange instead of green when `Increased Memory Limit` is not enabled.
- Pausing now pauses the entire game and audio instead of only the renderer.
- Rename "Games" tab to "Library".

---

## Fixes
- AutoJIT (Automatic JIT Enabling) on iOS 26 or when using Certificates.
- Detection for iOS 26 TXM (A15 / M2+) JIT. (Fix JIT showing that its enabled when its not)
- File Picker with Certificates when picking folders. 
- Cheats (Thank you to @bxymartin for bringing this to my attention). 
- Crashing issues with notifications, changing volume, leaving app, etc.
- Skip Setup.
- Borders when using AirPlay.
- Fix Touch not working when using Virtual Controller.
- Splatoon 2/3.
- Fix Super Mario Wonder (and other games that use profile images).
- Random Crashes in Super Mario 3D World.
- Fix crash when launching Metroid Prime 4.
- URL Schemes enabling JIT.

---

## Additions
- Controller Configuration in-game.
- Multiple Library View Options (List, Grid, Compact Grid, etc).
- Brand New App Icons.
- Controller Support in List Library View.
- Mod Manager.
- Alternate Frontend Support with URL Schemes (SUMEE and Manic support).
- Touch Rework with Multi-Touch Support.
- Liquid Glass UI and App Icons.

- Background Music.
- New Crash Alert (ft. Sad Mac).
- UI Shader Cache Loading Bar.
- Remove "New" UI.
- Link to Install Guide when `Increased Memory Limit` Entitlement is not enabled.
- Global Virtual Controller Layout Editor.

# What's New

## Updates
- Updated Motion for BackBone Controllers  
- Updated Mods to improve support  
- Updated Device / OS Detection  
- Updated MoltenVK  
- Updated iOS 15 UI  
- Updated Memory management to reduce RAM usage  

---

## Fixes
- Fixed file importer when using a certificate  
- Fixed games crashing due to internet issues (e.g., DOOM 2016)  
- Fixed Unreal Engine games flickering or showing broken graphics  
- Fixed various games including The Witcher 3, Silksong, Assassin's Creed, Spyro 1–3, Crash 4, and others  
- Fixed Sonic Frontiers  
- Fixed iOS 16 support  
- Fixed Cheats (thank you @UmiAoi)  
- Fixed UI lockups  
- Fixed iOS 26 / iPadOS 26 external monitor and AirPlay support  

---

## Additions
- Added iOS 26 support for both TXM and Non-TXM devices  
- Added macOS features  
- Added Controller Layout Editor and Global Virtual Controller Layout  
- Added Clear Shader Cache and Clear All Shader Cache buttons  
- Added new Emulation Display UI option  
- Added Internet support (non-Nintendo servers)  
- Added LAN Mode Multiplayer (supports Ryujinx forks, MeloNX, and stock Switches)  
- Added ldn_mitm Multiplayer (supports Ryujinx forks, MeloNX, and modded Switches)  
- Added Profile Configuration  
- Added Controller Type setting  
- Added Custom ROM directory (not compatible with cloud storage)  
- Added Controller Reconnection  
- Added Extended Virtual Addressing Entitlement Detection  
- Added LiveContainer (not recommended) Detection and Integration  
- Added arm64 device support (when using TrollStore)  
- Added Updated Performance HUD  
- Added Proper File Picker Fix  
- Added Certificate mention in Setup  
- Added Increased Memory Entitlement Alert on game launch  
- Added Full SDK20 and REV15 / Firmware 20 support

# What's New
- **UE Games**: Fixes the bug in the last release that causes Unreal Engine games to show a black screen or have colour issues.
- **Virtual Controller Button**: Fixes bug where buttons don't properly register clicks.
- **Launch Crash**: Fixes the bug where the app crashes on any game launch with `System.PlatformNotSupportedException`
- **Fix TimeZones**: Fixes the bug where time in-games aren't reflected properly

# What's New

### Major Performance and Stability Improvements  
We've made significant under-the-hood changes to dramatically boost both performance and overall stability. Expect faster load times, smoother gameplay, and reduced crashes across the board.

### Improved Game Compatibility  
- Substantial compatibility upgrades across many titles.  
- **Unreal Engine games** no longer display a black screen—games now render with texture flickering.
- **Fixed "Player 1 to Handheld" option** – You can now play titles that previously wouldn't let you go past a controller screen, such as the Pokémon games!

---

### Enhanced Experience and Features

- **All-New Main Menu UI** – A refreshed, modern design for easier navigation.
- **Motion Controls** – Works seamlessly with both physical controllers and iPhone/iPad gyroscopes.
- **Rumble Support** – Feel the game with controller vibration feedback.
- **Revamped Settings UI** – Streamlined layout for better usability.
- **Per-Game Settings** – Customize controls and options for each title individually.
- **New Virtual Controller** – Rebuilt from the ground up for better responsiveness and customization.

---

### Fixes and Improvements

- Fixed **Metal HUD toggle** not working as intended.
- **Crash Detection on Launch** – Automatically detects launch-time crashes and displays helpful prompts.
- **System Time Fix** – In-game time now syncs correctly with your device.
- **Enhanced Logging** – Now includes device model and entitlement info for easier debugging.
- **Auto StikDebug** – Automatically enables advanced debugging tools.
- **Updated and Fixed DLC / Update Manager** – Improved handling of game updates and downloadable content for smoother management.

---

### New Settings Options

- **Button Hold Toggle** – Tap once to simulate holding a button when using the Virtual Controller.
- **Show Stick Buttons** - Shows L3 and R3 on when using the Virtual Controller.
- **Virtual Controller Opacity** – Adjust the transparency of on-screen controls.
- **Disable Touch Screen** – Optional setting to prevent accidental input.
- **Swap Face Buttons (Physical Controller)** – Swaps ABXY layout to match your preferred controller scheme.
- **Black Screen on AirPlay (Light Mode)** – Prevents unwanted screen mirroring visuals.
- **Location Access (Optional)** – Prevents app suspension in the background. *(Location data is not collected or transmitted.)*
- **App Icon Switcher** – Choose from alternate app icons to personalize your Home Screen.
